name: ARGE – The European Federation of Associations of Locks & Builders Hardware Manufacturers
goal:
The objectives of ARGE are:

To represent the interests of its members, which are National Associations of Locks and Builders Hardware Manufacturers, on any European or international body.
To represent and to take any appropriate action to support the interests of its members, in particular:
in matters of standardisation
in matters of regulatory rules resp. legislation
in the sphere of international trade
To collect and disseminate information of particular importance to the membership.
To support its members in progressing of standards development and the creation of specific Working Groups.
interests: Business and Industry, Environment, Single market
euInitiatives:
Construction Products Regulation
REACH Regulation
RoHS Directive
Circular Economy
Waste Framework Directive
Ecodesign Directive
Sustainable Buildings
Joint Initiative on Standardisation
